title: Missing Poppy skins
body: I just updated and got on to league about 15 mins ago and I love Poppy so I went straight to check out the new art and what not only to find out... both Blacksmith and Nox skins which i owned for Poppy have vanished and they are not there......

replies.body:
Hey Hellverse,

Thanks for the report! 

This is a visual issue on the Champion Details Page due to legacy content display issues. You're still able to use the skin in game! ^-^
Thank you very much for the update!

A note: this looks like it's just a profile bug. I went into an actual game, and I do have access to all of my Poppy skins. So yay! You can't see the splash art from your profile, but you can play them in game still. ^_^
Thank you very much for letting me and the rest of everyone else know!
same, but for me it's Ragdoll Poppy

I am also missing Poppy skins! QQ I know had Lollipoppy, and I'm pretty sure I had Nox and one other (I haven't played her in a while).

EDIT: It says I have no skins at all, btw. So I'm missing all of the skins I had, not just one.
I'm nervous now, I own Lollipoppy...
my lollipoppy skin didnt show up
As I stated I already own them but they are not showing up for me.
